page.topic: Set Insertion Point in a Field

section.title: Overview
section.description: The Set Insertion Point in a Field action places the cursor to a specified location in a field.

step.description: Make a selection in the Set the insertion point in a field in which window? field. This field will be grayed out unless this action is based on a Form or Browse. The choices are:
In the Window Name field select either:
Select one of the listed forms or browses.
In the Object Name field select a text field on the form or browse. Click the Value icon to select the field.
Specify the character position at which to set the insertion point. The value 1 set the insertion point at the beginning of the field. The value "-1" sets the insertion point at the end of the field.
Optionally modify the comment that describes the action.
